titleStmt.title: An Englis[h] expositor[:] teaching the in[ter]pretation of the harde[st] words [vsed] in our language. With sundry [ex]plicat[ions, de]scriptions [, and d]iscourses. By I.B. ...
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Bullokar)

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; all after O5 lacking; some print faded and show-through, and some stained; title page mutilated, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
